EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-03-12-Field-East-ESB-New-York.Marketing Invite 2.On Behalf of Gary Rein
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Invited: New York Rangers vs Carolina Hurricanes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/exec-newyork/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
On behalf of Gary Reiner, current Operating Partner and Former CIO of GE, we'd like to cordially invite you to an exclusive networking event at the Cisco NYC offices followed by a hockey game at the New York Rangers take on the Carolina Hurricanes on March 12th at the Madison Square Garden.
Executive Networking Series New York Workload Automation for Your Hybrid Cloud New York Rangers vs Carolina Hurricanes Monday, March 12th | Cisco NYC | 4:00 p.m.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/exec-district/]]>
Data center and cloud advancements are happening at an unprecedented rate. That means more decisions, requiring a broader set of skills to keep your workloads happy. While you can't automate people, your can automate workloads, and accelerate business growth Join your peers for the next stop in our Executive Networking Series to share knowledge on tackling these challenges and learn how organizations like yours are adopting workload automation at the scale of hybrid cloud. Following our cocktail hour and presentation, we'll take our seats in the Turbonomic Suite. We hope you'll be able to join us and Cisco on March 12th at 4:00 PM by registering at the following link: http://turbonomic.com/exec-newyork <[[https://turbonomic.com/exec-newyork/]]> <[[https://turbonomic.com/exec-newyork/]]>
See you there,
The Turbonomic Team
